sentence: WILBERFORCE, Ohio (WDTN) – The Ohio Debate Commission will be holding primary debates for the US Senate and Governor’s race on March 28 and 29, but current Ohio governor Mike DeWine will not be joining them.
author: Sarah Bean
title: DeWine declines primary debate invitation

author: Anna Staver
title: Ohio Politics Explained podcast: DeWine declines debates, Democrats try to delay primary

author: Drew Scofield
title: Ohio Debate Commission: Gov. Mike DeWine won't participate in primary election debate

author: Jessie Balmert
title: Where's the beef? Between Gov. Mike DeWine and challenger Joe Blystone, it’s at the Expo
